head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WEIS, JEAN TULLIS

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WEIS, JEAN TULLIS

block.p: WEIS-Jean Tullis. On July 6, 2000 of Madison, CT. Formerly of Bellerose Village, NY. Beloved wife of the late Albert E. Daughter of the late Beatrice M. and James D. Tullis. Loving sister of Beatrice T. Ward of Chester, CT, formerly of Great Neck and Southold, NY. Dear aunt of Linda M. Ward of Naples, FL and Susan E. Wooton of Manchester, VT. Private Memorial Service at a later date. Memorials may be sent to: Shriners Hospital for Children, Attn: Donations, 2900 Rocky Point Drive, Tampa, FL, 33607.
